metadata.description: Updated Template for New Database Structure - ProductFeature (M:N) → Capabilities (M:N) → TechnicalFunction
notes: UPDATED: Many-to-Many relationship between ProductFeature and Capabilities implemented
Capabilities can now belong to multiple ProductFeatures
Use product_feature_ids array instead of single product_feature_id
Vehicle Platform IDs: 1=Terberg ATT, 2=CA500, 3=T800, 4=AEV, 5=Truck Platform, 6=Van Platform, 7=Car Platform, 8=Generic Platform

entities.name: Advanced Port Operations System
entities.description: Comprehensive autonomous vehicle system for port terminal operations including container handling coordination
entities.label: PF-PORT-2.0
entities.tmos: Complete 1000 autonomous port operations with 99.9% safety record and 95% efficiency

entities.name: Advanced Navigation and Positioning
entities.success_criteria: Navigate complex port layout with 99% accuracy using GPS and visual SLAM in GPS-denied areas
entities._note: product_feature_ids can contain multiple product feature names that use this capability
entities.tmos: Reliable navigation capability for all port environments

entities.name: Container Handling Coordination
entities.success_criteria: Coordinate with port equipment for safe container operations with 99.5% success rate
entities.tmos: Seamless integration with all port handling equipment

entities.name: Safety and Risk Management
entities.success_criteria: Detect and respond to safety hazards within 500ms with 99.9% accuracy
entities._note: This capability could be shared with other product features like 'Emergency Response System'
entities.tmos: Proactive safety monitoring and hazard response in port environment

entities.name: Object Detection and Classification
entities.success_criteria: Detect and classify objects with 99.5% accuracy in all weather conditions
entities._note: Example of capability shared across multiple product features
entities._vehicle_platform_note: 8=Generic Platform - applies to multiple vehicle types
entities.tmos: Universal object detection capability for autonomous vehicles

entities.name: GPS/IMU Integration
entities.description: High-precision navigation using GPS and inertial measurement unit fusion
entities.success_criteria: Provide position accuracy within 10cm in open areas and 50cm near metal structures

entities.name: Visual SLAM System
entities.description: Simultaneous Localization and Mapping using computer vision for GPS-denied environments
entities.success_criteria: Maintain accurate position in GPS-denied areas for up to 5 minutes
entities.tmos: Backup navigation system for challenging environments

entities.name: Port Layout Mapping
entities.description: Real-time mapping and localization within dynamic port environment
entities.success_criteria: Update port layout map in real-time with 95% accuracy for dynamic obstacles
entities.tmos: Dynamic environment mapping for port operations

entities.name: Equipment Communication Interface
entities.description: Communication system for coordinating with cranes, reach stackers, and other port equipment
entities.success_criteria: Maintain 99.9% communication reliability with port equipment using standard protocols
entities.tmos: Reliable communication with all port equipment types

entities.name: Container Status Tracking
entities.description: Real-time tracking of container location, orientation, and securing status
entities.success_criteria: Track container status with 99% accuracy throughout handling operations

entities.name: Multi-Sensor Collision Avoidance
entities.description: Advanced collision avoidance using LiDAR, cameras, and radar sensor fusion
entities.success_criteria: Detect and avoid obstacles and humans within 50m range with <200ms response time
entities.tmos: Comprehensive collision avoidance for port safety

entities.name: Emergency Stop System
entities.description: Fail-safe emergency stop with multiple redundancy levels
entities.success_criteria: Stop vehicle within 3 meters at maximum operational speed with 100% reliability

entities.name: Human Detection and Tracking
entities.description: Specialized system for detecting and tracking humans in port environment
entities.success_criteria: Detect humans within 25m safety buffer with 99.9% accuracy in all weather conditions

entities.name: Advanced Port Operations System
entities.description: Updated: Comprehensive autonomous vehicle system with enhanced safety features

entities.name: Advanced Navigation and Positioning
entities.success_criteria: Updated: Navigate complex port layout with 99.5% accuracy using enhanced GPS and visual SLAM

entities.name: GPS/IMU Integration
entities.description: Updated: Enhanced GPS/IMU integration with improved accuracy near metal structures
